opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Phillips, Chief Justice, Supreme Court of Texas v. Washington Legal Foundation

opinion:
538 U.S. 942

PHILLIPS, CHIEF JUSTICE, SUPREME COURT OF TEXAS, ET AL.
v.
WASHINGTON LEGAL FOUNDATION ET AL.

No. 02-1.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 31, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Brown v. Legal Foundation of Wash., ante, p. 216. Reported below: 270 F. 3d 180.
